940320.name: Combo Jumper
940320.description: Combo Jumper is a first person platformer. The core mechanic of the game is combo points. You gain a combo point every time you wall jump, your collected combo points multiply your launch velocity, giving you the ability to leap further. Missing your mark on a jump and falling to the ground resets your combo points and brings you to the start of the level. Combo Jumper includes 8 diverse levels that get progressively harder so don’t underestimate the amount of playtime you'll get because of the steep difficulty curve.
940320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
